name: Sector A-32
description:
The lives of a reporter, a novel writer and a scientist intertwine in this short dystopian and emotional first person sci-fi adventure game.
Unveil the truth...explore, discover, remember...and find a way out!

This game can be played in English or Italian language.

System: PC Windows (no Mac support)
Disk space : 1 GB
Screen resolution: Full HD (1920x1080)

If you want to ask questions/issue a bug on this game, you can join my game development Discord server: https://discord.gg/KKZ58mmc
